name: Anaglyph (SammiJ_97)
description: Anaglyph was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 game jam, with the theme of joined together. This game focuses on 2 characters that are stuck together in an escape room. You will have to focus on using both characters and taking advantage of their abilities to help them escape. Will you find what awaits you at the end of this strange dungeon? Be warned this game is not fully polished... much like myself. Hope you enjoy this short game.
